contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Kampot | native_name = {{nobold|{{lang|km|ខេត្តកំពត}}}} | native_name_lang = khm<!-- ISO 639-2 code --> | settlement_type = [[Administrative divisions of Cambodia|Province]] | image_skyline = Kampot riverside.jpg | image_caption = The riverside in Kampot City at dusk | image_flag = | image_seal = | image_shield = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Cambodia Kampot locator map.svg | map_caption = Map of Cambodia highlighting Kampot | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_caption = Location of Kampot in Cambodia | latd = 10 |latm = 36 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 104 |longm = 10 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:adm1st_region:KH | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = {{CAM}} | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = [[Kampot (city)|Kampot]] | leader_party = [[Cambodian People's Party|CPP]] | leader_title = Governor |leader_name = H.E. Khoy Khun Huor | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4873 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = <ref>{{cite web|url = http://www.stat.go.jp/english/info/meetings/cambodia/pdf/pre_rep1.pdf|title = General Population Census of Cambodia 2008 - Provisional population totals|publisher = National Institute of Statistics, Ministry of Planning|date = 3 September 2008|format = PDF}}</ref> | population_total = 627,884 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | blank_name_sec1 = [[Districts of Cambodia|Districts]] | blank_info_sec1 = 8 | blank1_name_sec1 = Communes | blank1_info_sec1 = 92 | blank2_name_sec1 = Villages | blank2_info_sec1 = 477 |timezone = Cambodia |utc_offset = +7 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = +855 | iso_code = KH-7 | website = | footnotes = }} {{Contains Khmer text}} '''Kampot''' ({{lang-km|ខេត្តកំពត}} {{IPA-km|kɑmpɔːt|IPA}}, "[[Tetraodontidae]]") is a [[provinces of Cambodia|province]] (''khaet'') of [[Cambodia]]. It borders the provinces of [[Koh Kong Province|Koh Kong]] and [[Kampong Speu Province|Kampong Speu]] to the north, [[Takeo Province|Takeo]] to the east, [[Sihanoukville]] to the west and [[Kep Province|Kep]] as well as a long coastline on the [[Gulf of Thailand]] to the south, Its capital is [[Kampot (city)|Kampot]] town. Kampot has a population of 627,884<ref>{{cite book|title=[http://www.ncdd.gov.kh/images/stories/ncdd/2010/pdb/eng/ProvDataBook_E_7_2008.pdf Kampot Data Book 2009]|publisher=National Committee for Sub-National Democratic Development (NCDD)|date=October, 2009|pages=15}}</ref> and consist of eight districts divided into 92 communes with a total of 477 villages.<ref>{{cite book|title=General Population Census of Cambodia, 1998: Village Gazetteer|publisher=National Institute of Statistics|date=February, 2000|pages=xviii}}</ref> Touk Meas City is located in Kampot Province. ==Districts== The province is subdivided into 8 districts. *0701 [[Angkor Chey]] - អង្គរជ័យ *0702 [[Banteay Meas]] - បន្ទាយមាស *0703 [[Chhuk]] - ឈូក *0704 [[Chum Kiri]] - ជុំគិរី *0705 [[Dang Tong]] - ដងទង់ *0706 [[Kampong Trach]] - កំពង់ត្រាច *0707 [[Kampot District|Teouk Chhou, changed from Kampot district in 2008]] - ស្រុកទឹកឈូ បានប្ដូរឈ្មោះមកពីស្រុកកំពតឆ្នាំ២០០៨ *0708 [[Kampong Bay|Kampot Town, changed from Kampong Bay in 2008]] - ក្រុងកំពត បានប្ដូរឈ្មោះពីស្រុកកំពង់បាយឆ្នាំ២០០៨ [[File:Bokor view.jpg|thumb|center|300px|View of the coast near Kampot from Bokor mountain]] == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.investincambodia.com/Kampot%20Province%20Investment%20Profile.htm The 2010 Kampot Provincial Investment Profile by USAID and the Provincial Administration] {{Geographic location |Centre = Kampot Province |North = [[Kampong Speu Province]] |Northeast = |East = [[Takeo Province]] |Southeast = [[Kien Giang province]], {{flag|Vietnam}}<br>''[[Gulf of Thailand]]'' |South = [[Kep Province]] |Southwest = ''[[Gulf of Thailand]]'' |West = [[Sihanoukville Province]] |Northwest = [[Koh Kong Province]] }} {{Commons|Kampot}} {{Provinces of Cambodia}} {{KampotProvince}} [[Category:Kampot Province| ]] [[Category:Provinces of Cambodia]] {{cambodia-geo-stub}}
